sentence.text: Our current study found that phosphoserine aminotransferase 1 (PSAT1), an enzyme catalyzing serine biosynthesis, was significantly up-regulated in non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) and was involved in the regulation of E2F activity.
Loss- and gain-of-function experiments demonstrated that PSAT1 promoted cell cycle progression, cell proliferation and tumorigenesis.
Correlation analysis showed that PSAT1 expression positively correlated with the levels of phosphorylated GSK-3Î², cyclin D1 and phosphorylated Rb in NSCLC primary tumors.
